      • checkTan

        public boolean checkTan(Tan tan,
                        java.lang.String telephoneNumber)
        This method checks whether the given TelephoneNumber is the same as the TelephoneNumber that is saved with the given TAN as the key in the TanHashMap.
        Parameters:
        tan - the TAN Object to be checked
        telephoneNumber - the TelephoneNumber to be checked
        Returns:

      • checkTan

        public boolean checkTan(java.lang.String tanString,
                        java.lang.String telephoneNumber)
        This method checks whether the given TelephoneNumber is the same as the TelephoneNumber that is saved with the given TAN as the key in the TanHashMap.
        Parameters:
        tanString - the TanNumber to be checked
        telephoneNumber - the TelephoneNumber to be checked
        Returns:

      • generateNewTan

        public Tan generateNewTan(java.lang.String telephoneNumber)
        Generates a new TAN for the given TelephoneNumber. To confirm the newly generated TAN after the order has been complete use confirmTan(tan) If generating a new TAN fails a TAN with the status NOT_FOUND is returned.
        Parameters:
        telephoneNumber - the TelephoneNumber
        Returns:

      • confirmTan

        public void confirmTan(Tan tan)
        This method confirms a Tan by setting its status to VALID and putting it into the tanHashMap. If there already exists an entry with the same TelephoneNumber the status of the tan in this entry is set to USED. The entry of this Tan in the notConfirmedTans HashMap gets deleted.
        Parameters:
        tan - The Tan you want to confirm

      • invalidateTan

        public void invalidateTan(Tan tan)
        This method invalidates a Tan by setting its status to USED and replacing the TelephoneNumber with an empty String.
        Parameters:
        tan - The Tan you want to invalidate

      • deleteNotConfirmedTan

        public boolean deleteNotConfirmedTan(Tan tan)
